description:
Discover five simple and effective ways to secure your GPG key on Linux. Keep your online communications safe and protect your identity today.

The post 5 Tips to Secure Your GPG Key in Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 5 Tips to Secure Your GPG Key in Linux

description:
Still powered by the Liquorix-flavored Linux 6.8 kernel series and using the KDE Plasma 5.27.11 desktop environment, along with the KDE Frameworks 5.115 software suite, Nitrux 3.5 includes the latest Mesa 24.1 open-source graphics stack and the beta version of the upcoming NVIDIA 555 proprietary graphics driver series.

The post Systemd-Free and Immutable Distro Nitrux 3.5 Is Here With Mesa 24.1, NVIDIA 555 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Systemd-Free and Immutable Distro Nitrux 3.5 Is Here With Mesa 24.1, NVIDIA 555

description:
In this guide, we will demonstrate how to install and configure a mail server on Ubuntu 24.04, as large and medium-sized companies can greatly benefit from having a private email server. By utilizing a mail server, it becomes feasible to monitor all email traffic closely. Additionally, the flexibility to customize settings enables the establishment of […]

The post How to Install and Configure an Email Server on Ubuntu 24.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install and Configure an Email Server on Ubuntu 24.04

description:
Linux hardware vendor System76 unveiled the latest generation of the Darter Pro Linux-powered ultrabook featuring Intel Core Ultra processors with Intel Arc graphics, an upgraded display, and other improvements.

The post System76’s Darter Pro Linux Laptop Gets 16:10 Display, Intel Core Ultra CPUs appeared first on Linux Today.
title: System76’s Darter Pro Linux Laptop Gets 16:10 Display, Intel Core Ultra CPUs

description:
Caddy 2.8 web and reverse proxy server arrives as a massive update with major improvements. Here’s more on that!

The post Caddy 2.8 Web Server Is Here with Many Improvements appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Caddy 2.8 Web Server Is Here with Many Improvements
